info.title: Read information about a spin button in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnSpinButtonAndSetPredefinedDate
setupScript.description: sets the date picker to March 19, 2021, and sets focus on the 'Day' spin button

user: With the reading cursor on the 'Day' spin button, read information about the button.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the 'Day' spin button, read information about the button.
instructions.mode: Insure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.
